attributes.action: please undercover investigate the allocation of better paid nursing shifts and do something about sexual harrassment in the workplace
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it's bad enough having to live in a sexist society, but if the British govt is going to recruit cockle pickers to work next to British subjects - please orientate them better about conduct and sexual harrassment.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
